job_description:

• Experience working for interactive 3D application.

• Strong technical knowledge in software development methodologies with experience in project planning and implementation.
• At Synopsys, we want talented people of every background to feel valued and supported to do their best work.
• The actual compensation offered will be based on a number of job-related factors, including location, skills, experience, and education.
• Apply Now Save Perform software development activities in areas including GUI, 3D and 2D visualization, post processing, software design and user experience.
• Understand the requirements for a product, including target environment, performance criteria, and competitive issues.
• BS in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field with 2 years’ experience or Masters DegreeWorking experience with in technical software development proven by academic, research, or industry projects.
